title: Simulation Training for Tutorial Action Plan (TAPdis) in Disability Translation

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of fundamental translation/interpretation theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Implementation of translation scenarios tailored to disability characteristics and strengthening practical competencies

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three translation strategies suitable for various disability types (visual, auditory, motor impairments, etc.)
Learners accurately complete a translation quality evaluation checklist from the perspective of individuals with disabilities in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners propose at least two customized support plans applicable in workplace settings based on the TAPdis framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
